attributes.action: remove the proposed levy on pub quizes and entertainment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown and his new Labour Government are planning a new levy on pub quizes and other entertainment.

A secret memo will order council tax poopers to snoop all pubs offering entertainment such as quizes, darts, karaoke and other entertainments.

They plan to heavily tax those pubs supporting these harmless social activities thus forcing landlords to cancel them or raising the prices out of the reach of the common man and woman. 

This tax is an absolute disgrace. Many landlords are under enough pressure with rising costs without this being added. We do have a life outside the home you know. Gordon Brown shouldn`t be allowed to put forward this proposal just because he is a sour puss at the mo.

Sign this petition and register your disgust.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
